"that means cheaper feed for horses, too." these commodities have fallen out of bed. right now, we're running backwards with prices where a year ago we were running up with prices, <q> said alan woodbury, owner of woody's performance horse feeds in dickinson, which supplies racetracks around the country. the oats situation is more complex than just a big crop in canada. commodity markets in general are affected by demand from the biofuels industry, woodbury said. the global financial turmoil also has dealt a blow to prices for most crops. </q> oats is never a leader in the marketplace. it's a follower, "woodbury said." so if beans and wheat and corn go down, oats is a follower. the mayor's race, with patrick voting for Ashley Swearengin and brian giving perea the nod. patrick nessier said he believed Ashley Swearengin 's business experience was the key difference." being mayor is like leading a business, patrick nessier said. brian nessier said he liked the work perea has done during six years on the city council. i especially like what he's done with downtown, "patrick nessier said. father and son agreed, though, that either would be a good mayor.

said to Lee Harvey , if someone shoots at you, i hope they're as good a shot as you are, " Jim Leavelle said." he smiled. i think it was the only time he did. Jim Leavelle saw the gun in ruby's hand right away. he tried to jerk oswald behind him, but that wound up only exposing oswald's body even more. later, he was able to move the bullet lodged under oswald's skin with his finger. Jim Leavelle doesn't believe in conspiracy theories. he said the number of people who claimed to have been on the when John F. Kennedy was shot could fill the cotton bowl. and his ready quip about the photo? i started to ask them to take it over. i didn't like the look of it.
